name: Apocalypse (itch) (jaraujo)
description:
God went mad at his own creation again, but this time he won't send a flood...

WASD - Move main character
M - Mute music
Esc - Quit game
-----------------------//----------------------
You can check out the game source code on github: https://github.com/JeanAraujo/Apocalypse-Love2D
